entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:50 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening then changing to 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 8 except minus 13 in low lying areas.
